A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie feels as if they conceptualized the fight scene with Rey and Kylo against the ‘status quo’\, and then decided to write a movie around that scene. They went away from the lore\, they had no idea who Luke Skywalker is/was\, and they Swiss-cheesed the plot beyond repair. They destroyed Poe’s fighter leaving him grounded and dull. Finn still has no origin and his conflict-ion is comical now. The casino scene was as useless to the plot as car insurance is to a shark. Whoever wrote this filth took too much artistic freedom when being a slave to the lore would’ve served him/her/them well. Good luck fillin those holes on the back 9...
